message: Let's be fair - I'll take the lion's share, but I'm giving you a decent chunk.  Accept and we can both walk away happy.

Alice, I've rejected your initial offer because the 90-10 split heavily favors you. Consider our inflation rates: you lose 20% per round while I only lose 5%. If we keep negotiating, you stand to lose much more. This 60-40 split is fair considering our different positions. If you reject, your potential gain will decrease significantly in the next round due to your higher inflation rate.

I understand your position about inflation, Bob. But 60-40 still feels too lopsided in your favor. Let's meet in the middle.  I'm willing to take a 60-40 split, with you getting the bigger share this time. This way, we both get a decent amount and we can move on from this.
